isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000i, 9000i - REMOVE - REMOVE HOOD

svcsubproc.title: Remove Hood on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA) and 9900 ix (SFA)

step1.para:
Remove hood grille from hood. Refer to Remove Hood Grille on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA) and 5500 i (SFA) and 5600 i (SBA) with Tilt Hood
or refer to Remove Hood Grille on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood .

Remove hood tilt assist spring assembly from radiator. Refer to Remove Hood Tilt Assist Spring Assembly on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA), 9400 i (SBA), 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood . Hood tilt assist spring assemblies can remain with the hood during hood removal.

Remove hood shock absorber from radiator. Refer to Remove Hood Shock Absorber on 9100 i (SBA), 9200 i (SBA) and 9400 i (SBA)
or refer to Remove Hood Shock Absorber on 9900 i (SFA), 9900 ix (SFA) and 5900 i (SFA) with Tilt Hood . Hood shock absorber can remain with the hood during hood removal.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 12 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: To remove the hood, remove inboard side hex lock nut and flat washer (Items 1 and 2) from each hex bolt hinge pin (Item 3), then remove hex bolt hinge pin and flat washer (Items 3 and 4) from the outboard side of each hood hinge.

With an assistant, remove the hood assembly (Item 5) from the vehicle, make sure hood mounting insulator (Item 6) and hood hinge pin spacer (Item 7) remain in each hood hinge (Item 8). Place hood on an appropriate padded surface to protect painted surfaces.

If it is necessary to remove hood mounting insulator (Item 6) and hood hinge pin spacer (Item 7) from each hood hinge (Item 8), loosen hex bolt (Item 9) and push hood mounting insulator and hood hinge pin spacer out of hood hinge.

step1.para: To remove the hood, remove inboard side high crown nut (Item 1) and flat washer (Item 2) from each of the hood hinge pins (Item 3), then remove the other high crown nut (Item 4), flat washer (Item 5) with hood hinge pin (Item 3) from outboard side of each hood hinge bracket (Item 6).

With an assistant, remove the hood assembly (Item 7) from the vehicle, make sure hood mounting insulator (Item 8) and hood hinge pin spacer (Item 9) remain in each hood hinge (Item 10). Place hood on an appropriate padded surface to protect painted surfaces.

If it is necessary to remove hood mounting insulator (Item 8) and hood hinge pin spacer (Item 9) from each hood hinge (Item 10), loosen hex bolt (Item 11) and push hood mounting insulator and hood hinge pin spacer out of hood hinge.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Optional Butterfly Hood on 5600 i (SBA)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 15 for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Release both hood latches from hood latch catches (Item 1) on both driver and passenger side of hood assembly. Raise each side of the hood, as required, to remove mounting hardware and remove the hood as follows.

Remove two flat head screws and hex lock nuts (Items 2 and 3, View in Circle A) that secure front hinge retainer (Item 4, View in Circle A) to the radiator shell flange (Item 5) and hinge rod and hinge support prop bracket assembly (Item 6).
Remove shoulder bolt and spring washer (Items 7 and 8) at the top of the hood support prop (Item 9) securing it to the driver side upper hood panel (Item 14), driver side shown.
Repeat step 3 above to remove passenger side hood support prop from passenger side upper hood panel (Item 15). This will allow the hood assembly (Item 13) to be removed from the vehicle.
Pull the center hood hinge pin (Item 10) out of the rear hinge retainer (Item 11), remove cowl hood pivot collar (Item 12) from center hood hinge rod.
With an assistant, lift off the butterfly hood assembly (Item 13).

note.para: If necessary, separate the butterfly hood assembly (Item 13) into four pieces - driver and passenger side upper hood panels (Items 14 and 15), and driver and passenger side hood side panels (Items 16 and 17) - by removing the side hood hinge rod (Item 18) from each side and center hood hinge rod (Item 10) from upper hood panels.

step1.para: To remove rear hinge retainer (Item 11), remove two flat head screws and hex lock nuts (Items 19 and 20) and remove rear hinge retainer, upper and lower barry mount hood insulators (Item 21) from the hood hinge cowl bracket (Item 22).
To remove hood hinge cowl bracket (Item 22), remove three hex lock nuts and flat washers (Items 23 and 24) and remove hood hinge cowl bracket from three mounting studs (Item 25).

To remove left and right lower hood guide plate (Item 26, View in Circle B), remove two hex nuts, lock washers and flat washers (Items 27, 28 and 29, View in Circle B) and remove hood guide plate from two mounting studs (Item 30, View in Circle B).

To remove cowl hood hinge weld stud bracket (Item 31). First remove cowl tray (Item 32), refer to Group 16 - CAB in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual. Then remove three hex nuts and lock washers (Items 33 and 34) and remove cowl hood hinge weld stud bracket from center hood support weld stud plate (Item 35) on the cowl.
